generated_body: The article titled "Experts crack mystery of ancient Egypt's sacred bird mummies" is likely to delve into recent discoveries regarding the mummification practices of sacred birds in ancient Egyptian culture. Readers can expect an overview of the scientific techniques used to analyze these mummies, possibly including CT scans or DNA analysis. The piece may also explore the cultural significance of these birds, shedding light on their role in religious practices and rituals. Additionally, it could discuss how these findings contribute to our broader understanding of ancient Egyptian society and its burial customs.
